Name: 12/70 Frag12 高爆弹
Description: Damage: 147    Penetration: 31    Fuse Distance: ~3 meters    Blast Range: 2~3 meters (no fragmentation)    Blast Power: 20 (low)                                                                                                               The 12-gauge shotgun uses the 12/70 Frag12 high-explosive shell, which fires a metal body approximately 50 millimeters long filled with a small amount of explosive. Upon impact, it detonates, causing damage to the target.
